body:
Comment 3 by **milak.mlk**: 
Ok, i dowloaded 32 bit version but it is not as easy as it seems :
    - i had to edit B:\Programmes\programmation\go32\src\pkg\runtime\extern.go file to specify theGoos and theGoarch
    - i had to find zasm_linux_386.h file in my target linux system
    - and then i have an error :

# command-line-arguments
.string: dwarf: missing type: type.runtime.eface

What am i missing ?
